glsa.title: Patch: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: Patch is vulnerable to a locally generated Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Patch takes a patch file containing a difference listing produced by the diff program and applies those differences to one or more original files, producing patched versions.

description.p: Due to a flaw in Patch, the application can enter an infinite loop when processing a specially crafted diff file.

impact.p: A local attacker could pass a specially crafted diff file to Patch, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All patch users should upgrade to the latest version:
